briefdescription.para: StreamChatClient handles direct communication with getstream.io Chat API.

detaileddescription.para: Architecture: Plugin talks directly to getstream.io (REST + WebSocket) Backend only provides authentication tokens via GET /api/v1/auth/stream-token

Features:
Channel management (create, query, delete)
Message operations (send, query, edit, delete, reactions)
Real-time updates via WebSocket
Typing indicators
Read receipts
Presence tracking (app-wide)
Audio snippet sharing
